## lineSplit() function

split a string into a list of lines

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lineSplit(string: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  string | <code>string</code> | string to split |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string[]`

list of the individual lines in the string
